name: MiracleOfLight
0:
”Alexa, open Miracle Of Light”
”Alexa, start Miracle Of Light”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: miracle of light
des: Are you spammed with meat balls and bread? Listen to the story of pearl boy and the Goddess of Light, a New Age Spirituality story of a Goddess who saved the day. Create a Lego figurine of her and pray to light. Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
